text: Rožično () is a small dispersed settlement in the Tuhinj Valley in the Municipality of Kamnik in the Upper Carniola region of Slovenia. It lies along the side valley of Rožičnica Creek, a tributary of the Nevljica River. ==References== ==External links== * *Rožično at Geopedia Category:Populated places in the Municipality of Kamnik
title: Rožično
